meanings.definition: A dish consisting of corn and lima beans cooked together.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious bowl of succotash for dinner.
meanings.sent2: My grandma makes the best succotash with fresh vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The succotash at the potluck disappeared in no time!
meanings.sent4: The succotash was a colorful mosaic of flavors on my plate.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the simmering succotash filled the kitchen with warmth.

meanings.sent1: I will succotash the ingredients for our picnic.
meanings.sent2: Let's succotash together for a cozy family meal.
meanings.sent3: She loves to succotash while listening to music.
meanings.sent4: In the kitchen, we succotash like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The family gathered around to succotash the tasty dish with joy.
